text: "Nuit 17 à 52"French: nuit = "night" is a song by Christine and the Queens. It was released as a digital download on 3 June 2013 through Because Music as the lead single from her debut studio album Chaleur humaine (2014). On the US and UK editions of the album, it was replaced by an English version entitled "Night 52". The song was written by Héloïse Letissier, i.e. Christine and the Queens herself. The song was also released alongside an extended play of the same name, which charted at number 130 on the French Albums chart. ==Music video== A music video to accompany the release of "Nuit 17 à 52" was first released onto YouTube on 12 June 2013 at a total length of three minutes and fifty-five seconds.Christine and the Queens - Nuit 17 à 52 (Clip Officiel) - YouTube In this black-and-white video, Christine and the Queens plays several characters. ==Track listing== {{Track listing | headline = Nuit 17 à 52 - EP {{Track listing | headline = Nuit 17 à 52 - EP (Deezer Session) ==Chart performance== ===Single=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2014) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Belgium (Ultratip Flanders) | 11 |- ! scope="row"| France (SNEP) | 75 |- |} ===EP=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2013) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |} ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format ! scope="col"| Label |- ! scope="row"| Various | 3 June 2013 | | Because Music |- |} ==References== Category:2013 singles Category:2013 songs Category:Christine and the Queens songs Category:Because Music singles Category:Songs written by Héloïse Letissier Category:Christine and the Queens albums Category:2013 EPs Category:Because Music albums
title: Nuit 17 à 52
